short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your images with proper name using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Candy is a fascinating AI-powered Google Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way you manage your downloaded images. After you save a picture, this clever tool uses artificial intelligence to analyze the content of your image. It then automatically generates a descriptive and meaningful filename for your downloaded image.

This smart naming feature offers several key benefits:

1. Organization: It makes it much easier to sort and find specific images in your collections.
2. Sharing: When you share these files, the recipients immediately understand what the image contains without having to open it.
3. Inspiration: The AI-generated names can sometimes spark your creativity, giving you new perspectives on the images you've saved.

One of the best things about Candy is its user-friendly nature. The extension is designed to be intuitive and seamless, requiring minimal effort on your part to enjoy its benefits.

Regarding privacy concerns, we want to assure our users that we take data protection very seriously. Candy does not record, store, or retain any of your personal information or image data. The AI analysis is performed locally, ensuring that your images and their contents remain private and secure.
